function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low-scoring technical domains in BACS","Impact":"Decreased performance against impact criteria","Mitigation":"Implement specific systems to improve low-scoring domains","Technologies":"BACS systems with advanced control and automation capabilities","People":"Building occupants and stakeholders","Owner":"Building management and maintenance team"},{"Description":"Legislative limitations affecting BACS improvements","Impact":"Inability to make required improvements due to legal constraints","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research on legislations and regulations impacting BACS","Technologies":"Legal consulting services and BACS compliance software","People":"Building management and legal experts","Owner":"Building management team"},{"Description":"Health care facility comfort improvements in BACS","Impact":"Decreased comfort for patients and staff","Mitigation":"Incorporate BACS features tailored to enhance comfort in health care facilities","Technologies":"BACS with specialized comfort control capabilities","People":"Patients, healthcare staff, and facility administrators","Owner":"Health care facility management team"}]}
